attributes.action: cut road tax in rural areas and areas with no congestion issues
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with the increase in running a car, rural areas are again on the losing end.  quite often minimum wage is the average and public transport is not appropriate or a viable option as is the car sharing scheme as two workers car come from two different directions to do the same job.  these increases in tax's are making it difficult to make ends meet and should not be brought into the same catagories as highly congested areas.  reduce these taxes or workers in rural areas will continue to suffer
